text:
@WhiteHouse Did nothing for 6 weeks leading to 110K dead from Covid19.
40mln unemployed.
USA on fire for a week,
Spews hate during a time where he should be bringing the country together.
Attacks his own country with secret forces.
Becomes better know as bunker bitch.
Fixed it for you.
